record.name: ObjectLink
record.description: Links text to an object on the chart or identifies it as the title.
record.author: Andrew C. Oliver (acoliver at apache.org)

field.name: anchor id
field.description: what is the text object linked to

field.name: link 1
field.description: if this is a data series or point, this holds a link to that point or series

field.name: link 2
field.description: if this is a data series or point, this holds a link to that point or series
